snippet: Marcus Smart had no intention of avoiding Joel Embiid, Kansas' 7-foot shot blocker....

headline.print_headline: Smart Leads Oklahoma St Past No. 5 Kansas, 72-65
headline.main: Smart Leads Oklahoma St Past No. 5 Kansas, 72-65

lead_paragraph: Marcus Smart had no intention of avoiding Joel Embiid, Kansas' 7-foot shot blocker.
